name: Turbo Fix
description:
You play as a person hired to renovate and repair any kind of objects. You are well known in your category and also very busy, so you have to be quick !

The goal is to repair any amount of objects with any other movable object. The better the objects fit into the original shape, the most points you will earn.
Be the best Turbo fixer !

Team members :

Bechraoui Sadri : Game Designer / 3D / Sound Designer (https://sadri01.itch.io/)

Leo Bergougnoux : Game Designer / 2D-3D / Level Designer (https://sinhberg.itch.io/)

Axel Born : Game Designer / Coding / Level Designer (https://axelvborn.itch.io/)

Matthieu Bonnet Millé : Game Design / Coding / Level Designer (https://imaqtpony.itch.io)

Hugo Lafont : Game Designer / 2D-3D / Level Designer          (https://lafont.itch.io/)

Leo Nicolas :Game Designer / 2D-3D / Level Designer (https://peoplesuck.itch.io/)
